content: from the hook and into each remaining chain then attach with a slip_stitch to the top right hand side of the mask slip_stitch loosely in each st across the top of the mask ch37 slip_stitch loosely into the second chain from the hook and in each remaining chain back towards the mask fasten_off and hide loose ends i really hope you have enjoyed making your weebee scrubs please share your projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page don t forget to add your project to ravelry and share photo s on instagram using the tags on the first page
